documents.document: My horse gave me some serious brattitude tonight
The perils of working in a bookshop... treated myself to this adorable cookbook 🍅🌽🌶 https://t.co/Lpkb7zQKmv
I tried to give my makeup an edge with bright orange lipstick but applied it in semi darkness and now I just look tragic
A high percentage of the human race is sitting in their car, too tired to get out
@bookables1 hope you love it and that you get lots of cute feels ❤️💋🍓
@Roselover24 35 and feeling it today
⬅️ old as dirt
Imagine how old & wrecked & crippled & grisly & sun spotted & yellow toothed & leathery & wizened & veined & ancient I look to a 16yo
"SIXTEEN" I repeated, agog. I assume everyone younger than me is in that vague no-mans land age: mid twenties.
@kateclayborn some of them are so repulsive 😊
I'm at that age where I can no longer tell how old anyone younger than me is. I found out a gal at the stable is 16 and died of shock.
@cybermelli get this book, it's amazing. Here's the ISBN. https://t.co/v8HWJ3LjXa
This book is an invaluable resource https://t.co/9ZNkphCkm4
That last Workaholics ep 'Bill & Tez's Sexcellent Sexventure' was one of the most incredibly awesome eps they've ever done
How can you possibly own a horse and not be able to spell horse?
Horse sale ads are so painfully riddled with spelling errors it's astounding. I saw someone go with the bold spelling choice 'horze'
I haven't been following @conniebritton all this time? What is WRONG WITH ME Y'ALL??
@alperryman that photo is beautiful.
@marthabwaters look at pics when she won her oscar and Paul is just glowing with admiration & pride & amazed he even sits next to her
@alperryman I love your gramps... I'll take three 😉
@marthabwaters love that he was still a tough muscly race car driver but he was also Joanne's adoring love slave
@ShinyJuliet he was divine 💘
You bet your bippy that in 1958 Paul Newman wasn't hitting the gym to get those abs. He probably dug trenches or moved hay bales.
If you haven't seen The Long Hot Summer you're missing out on THIS https://t.co/37ZPCFjFJT
My all time celebrity boyfriend is Paul Newman
@MJLally2nd daaaaang that would be some racy stuff 😜
He wants me to get it together and be a boss ass bitch. I am TRYING but all I want to do is hug and kiss him.
Had a good lesson this morning with Louie, teaching him to stand still when I'm mounting. Really realising I am way too soft with him.
@Sugarvaulter hugs! Hot shower & hot cup of tea and burn that car!
Worked all day and now have to go clean Louie's stable and wash his cracked heels with a medicated shampoo
I can ride my horse in the post apocalyptic world with Delia in a saddle bag
Cash is most important...when the electricity grids go down and the ATMs don't work you'll need to be able to bribe feudal lords for passage
I really think I'm going to start doomsday prepping. Tinned food, rice, huge water containers, cash, bug-out bag, matches, etc
Horse owner's diary: today the vet came out to give Louie a vaccination. All is well. I bring him in at 7pm and he has a cut on his neck.
@cybermelli aw bless
@cybermelli Should have told him he'd be pretty if he just smiled more. Enough dudes say it to women.
@cybermelli sheesh would it have killed him to smile??!
@Kristen_Arnett can you or can you not read? Put an end to this debate once and for all.
@PunkyBellyJelly I personally love a good arm-rubbing
@PunkyBellyJelly it's the perfect song for all the unrequited lovesick weirdos who are ok with just having a guy rubbing on their arm
I have these weird burning numb hands until around noon. I guess I need to do something about this new development.
I have been doing a lot of heavy physical work cleaning Louie's stable and now I wake up with pins and needles in my hands every morning 😟
@PunkyBellyJelly glad you like it! Also nice to see you around these here parts.
This song is huge in Australia right now & is definitely on my writing playlist- Amy Shark 'Adore' https://t.co/TDHdvHQNWs
I am ok this morning after my small horse related head injury yesterday. Still hurts but I can have actual thoughts now.
So my mild concussion symptoms are still in play after being hit in the head by some part of my horse's back leg
@Ana_Patricio I recommend taking the book to the toilet with you, you can easily get in another chapter that way
My twitter feed is so stressful & I'm on the other side of the planet TOMORROW. Hang in there US friends, I'm sending baskets of baby koalas
It's possible I have a mild concussion
@PunkyBellyJelly true, the worst we have is a total fire ban and a potato shortage
My brain and face hurts
@xSuperAshx he didn't care and forgot he did it instantly. It's really hard to not take pain personally!
@NelsonSmandela I think I am! (Dies in bed due to concussion)
I think I'll have a bruise on my temple, arm & ankle, probably. And I've got a headache. Fantastic fun all round. That's horses for you.
It was my own fault but OW
I touched my horse on his belly & surprised him. He kicked out, I got hit on the head with some part of his leg & I have a goose egg lump
@sri_ffn then I'd have to put a laundry hamper in his stall & spend my time hanging out enormous shorts on the line...
@hyokai94 it's actually set wherever you think it is, in your imagination! I think that's why it's sold to over 10 countries by now 😊
@rainonroof ugh he's so shameless
Maybe I should buy this mini horse, it looks so much like Louie! I'd call him L'il Lou ❤️ https://t.co/78hkOw7iQp
Also my new name plaque for my stable arrived- the dream must be true! Pls excuse Louie's doodle. He should wear sh… https://t.co/jnSIG6tDuM
Had an hour ride with my new friend and Louie was great. I love being able to ride my own horse whenever I want, it's a dream come true!
Tell 'em they're dreaming
Selling a vintage Kenner Blythe doll on eBay and someone just sent me an offer $175 below my selling price.
It's so hot the aircon at my husband's work has died and they've all been sent home. Australia is hotter than hell right now.
@MrsTomSauter only every damn day
@pablitasan @saarikkoxo clear eyes, full hearts, can't lose ❤️
Such severe fire danger tomorrow they're bringing all the horses in close to the stables in case.
Most of the time when I'm driving, I'm yelling at birds to get off the road
@FanGirlMubbz aw you cutie, thank you!! ❤️💋🍓
Woah my twitter feed is making my head spin
In the end it WAS killed by a large practical man with a shovel. Which I think was a shame, but on the flipside I am glad.
There was hysteria, of an Australian sort: lots of people standing around looking at it saying occasionally: 'should we kill it?'
Went for a lovely quiet trail ride with Louie this morning. Then returned to the stables & a brown snake was climbing up the feed room wall
@Sugarvaulter The only solution is to burn it down
@DannyGirlRS Ha oh dear, I'm afraid that's all she wrote! ❤️💋🍓
So there's a snake in the wall two doors down from my horse and I feel like snakes are watching me at all times now, even in my home
She is pregnant but still decided to try to kill the world's second most venemous snake 😐 I would have been GONE
The young lady who spotted it tried to kill it with a shovel but it went into the wall behind a paneling.
Just as I arrived at the stables this evening someone saw a brown snake in the feed room 🐍
It was Australia Day today- burger lunch, nap, horse, BBQ, watched Short Circuit
#TheHatingGame is also nominated in a second RT Book Review award category- mainstream fiction. Double wow! ❤️https://t.co/73PEdEAujp
I love being in the same category as @tiffanyreisz - hi girl! 😎😘
Popping in to say OMG #TheHatingGame is nominated for RT Book of the Year!! https://t.co/Hb1trSCxnQ
I need to take a short twitter break because my feed is giving me the horrors. I'm going to go write & ride my horse- not at the same time
The smiling/unsmiling Melania GIF is making me worry about how much trouble she's going to be in with him
My twitter feed is stressing me OUT
@Mj_Richardson destroy. them.
Thought I had a disgusting oozing zit on my forehead but it was just pasta sauce 😖
In 'You Can't Do That On Television' why did the kids keep going to Barth's Burgers given his food, hygiene and service were abysmal?
Louie got front shoes and was impeccably behaved. Then he had a shampoo bath, a roll in sawdust & a hearty dinner ❤️ https://t.co/xtzzx1IaSY
I wonder if the farrier will accept my hair as payment
@tiffanyd508 I know when I'm being lowballed 😑😑😑
@tiffanyd508 she said I'd get over $100 which sounds like a pittance for these years of work and sacrifice
@squalloogal we stable our horses at night and in the morning they go out into day paddocks to frolic and play until bedtime ❤️
I don't fold it down though. I saw ladies doing it in Tokyo and they looked cool but I am not a lady in Tokyo unfortunately
@tiffanyd508 it's long hair and not chemically treated, I bet she's been building up to this for months
I wear this Japanese visor at the stables which can actually fold down over my face like a welder's mask. I look ridiculous in it.
I hate the way the sun is always shining RIGHT into my eyes
@arfalcon yeah I need new sneakers but it's not going to happen anytime soon 😥
